```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(data.table)
library(dplyr)
```

## eQTL Analysis Report

### Summary of eQTL Results

#### Filtered eQTL Results (FDR <= 0.05)

```{r filtered_eqtl_results}
eqtl_results_filtered <- readRDS(params$eqtl_results_filtered)
summary(eqtl_results_filtered)
```

#### All eQTL Results

```{r all_eqtl_results}
eqtl_results <- readRDS(params$eqtl_results)
summary(eqtl_results)
```

### Detailed eQTL Results

#### Filtered eQTL Results (FDR <= 0.05)

```{r filtered_eqtl_details}
print(eqtl_results_filtered)
```

#### All eQTL Results

```{r all_eqtl_details}
print(eqtl_results)
```
